title: Multimodal Learning Strategies for Improving Visual Design in Geography Textbooks

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical digital device-based instruction and analysis of field-applicable case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze visual elements (maps, graphs, diagrams, etc.) in geography textbooks according to multimodal learning principles
Learners can propose design improvements that balance visual interest and information delivery efficiency
Learners can design learning activities that explain the correlation between visual navigation strategies and comprehension enhancement
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
